alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 4:08AM EST until March 05 at 4:30PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Sidney. Mad River at Springfield. Scioto River at Circleville. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Miamitown. Little Miami River at Spring Valley. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers... Little Miami River at Milford. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Miami River at Sidney. * WHEN...Until Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The river breaches the bank on Riverside Drive, with flooding of Custenborder Field at the east river intake. Flooding of properties occurs along the river on Riverside Drive from the BK Root Beer stand to the city limits. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM EST Saturday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
